# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate for the text storage object.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSTextStorageDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use a delegate object to monitor edits occurring to the text contents. Your delegate object must conform to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextStorageDelegate] protocol.

## Processing the editing actions

- **NSTextStorageDelegate**: The optional methods that delegates of text storage objects implement to handle text-edit processing.
